00073 // The commands in the following comments are used for the
00074 // doxygen documentation program. doxygen is forced to include the
00075 // source code of the named example programs into the documentation,
00076 // that then can be linked directly.
00077 // This "dirty trick" is necessary, because to put "\example [filename]"
00078 // directly into method documentations has some unaesthetic side effects.
00079 //
